name: Condemned Witch
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Forbidden" Quick-Play Spell from your Deck to your hand. During your opponentâ€™s Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 4 Fairy monster from your Deck, except "Condemned Witch". You can only use each effect of "Condemned Witch" once per turn.
